Bosses.Name: Chopper
Bosses.Strategy: Avoid being hit by "Charged Whisker" which is an AoE that inflicts paralysis.

Mechanics.Name: Charged Whisker
Mechanics.Description: Inflicts paralysis to all players hit.

Bosses.Name: Captain Madison
Bosses.Strategy: You must defeat Captain Madison twice. In the first encounter, kill adds first and then focus on the boss until they run away. In the second encounter they will summon guard dogs at 50% HP, kill these and attack until they flees.

Bosses.Name: Denn the Orcatoothed
Bosses.Strategy: During the boss fight, adds will spawn from the bubbling water, interact with the grate when it's bubbling to prevent spawning. These can also be safely ignored if enough damage is being dealt to the boss.
